dmca.title: [ABUSE] One of your clients is stealing our content]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 29, 2005 8:06 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] One of your clients is stealing our content]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------

X-Mozilla-Status:         0001

mail with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50) id
1DRc9O-0003Tu-Ol for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Fri, 29 Apr 2005 15:31:50 -0500

helo=[216.185.111.52]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from

(Exim) id 1DRc9B-00051W-Hd for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 29 Apr 2005
15:31:47 -0500
Received:         from [198.60.22.201] (helo=mgr1.xmission.com) by
mgr2.xmission.com with esmtp (Exim 4.34) id 1DRc8w-0003mS-Rd for
abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 29 Apr 2005 14:31:22 -0600
Received:         from [166.70.32.130] (helo=Wolverine) by mgr1.xmission.com
with esmtp (Exim 4.34) id 1DRc8q-0000wB-5r for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri,
29 Apr 2005 14:31:21 -0600
From:         Tim Roberts <tim@skiutah.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date:         Fri, 29 Apr 2005 14:31:11 -0600
Message-ID:         <004001c54cfa$6794ff00$0900a8c0@Wolverine>

boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0041_01C54CC8.1CFA8F00"

X-Mailer:         Microsoft Outlook, Build 10.0.6626
X-MimeOLE:         Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180
Importance:         Normal
X-Spam-Checker-Version:         SpamAssassin 3.0.2 (2004-11-16) on
mgr1.xmission.com

tests=ALL_TRUSTED,HTML_90_100, HTML_MESSAGE autolearn=disabled version=3.0.2

X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------

Cc:         
Subject:         [ABUSE] One of your clients is stealing our content

List-Id:         abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>

Utah.com.  Please shut him down.



Thank you.



*Tim Roberts*

Ski Utah

(801)534-1779

http://www.skiutah.com
